comment.body: Also, any reference to picnic should be removed to not tempt users into activating a non-supported algorithm again.

pull_request.title: Change openssh default host key algo to dilithium
pull_request.body: Follow up from discussion in https://github.com/open-quantum-safe/oqs-demos/issues/185#issuecomment-1451942190 , where changing the default host key algo to dilithium was mentioned.
